title: Dual Axis Charts: Comparing Apples and Oranges
description: A fast breakdown of Dual Axis Charts: Comparing Apples and Oranges for builders.

hook.text: A chart shows ice cream sales and shark attacks rising together. Two Y-axes make the correlation look perfect.

buildup.text: Dual axis charts put two different scales on left and right Y-axes, overlaying unrelated data.

discovery.text: The creator chooses each axis range independently â€” easily manufacturing fake visual correlations.

twist.text: Even experts fall for dual axis tricks. The visual alignment overrides critical thinking.

climax.text: Statistician Kieran Healy calls dual axis charts 'the data visualization equivalent of an optical illusion.'

punchline.text: Two axes, two scales, zero honesty.
